long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the official chrome extension to be used with the ReadGoodStuff website. Use this extension while on a website to tag it with a category and add the page to your 'MyPosts' tab or publish directly to the front page of the website. 

version 0.0.0.2 - fixed bug when multiple tabs are opened at the same time

version 0.0.2.0 - updated to work with version 2 of the main site
